t: cloud - Explain what Amazon EC2 is, and can I use it as a web hosting service? - Stack Overflow
Dedicated Server Hosting - Amazon EC2 Dedicated Hosts - AWS
s: Amazon EC2 Dedicated Hosts allow you to use your eligible software licenses from vendors such as Microsoft and Oracle on Amazon EC2, so that you get the flexibility and cost effectiveness of using your own licenses, but with the resiliency, simplicity and elasticity of AWS.
